title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.90 - Notice of designation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.90 - Notice of designation

State Regulations
(a) The parties shall be notified forthwith by the director of conciliation of the
name of the designated arbitrator. (b) The arbitrator, upon notification of
designation by the director of conciliation, shall immediately communicate
directly with the parties to make arrangements for preliminary matters such as
the date, time and place of the arbitration hearing. If the arbitrator cannot
schedule a hearing and determine the issues promptly, the arbitrator shall
notify the director of conciliation forthwith. The director of conciliation
shall take such action, consistent with this Part, as the director of
conciliation deems appropriate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
263.90

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
